entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as someone who was born at the end of July and has a mum and dad.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the boy who could vanquish Voldemort and has a scar that proves to be both a blessing and curse.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who would mark his equal and was defeated by Harry four times.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who explains to Harry why Voldemort chose him.

relationships.description: Voldemort chose Harry as his equal and gave him a scar that has proved both a blessing and curse.
Dumbledore explained to Harry why Voldemort chose him.
Voldemort did not choose Neville, but instead chose Harry.
Harry was a danger to Voldemort and that is why he chose him.
